A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The single worst Star Wars film ever to disgrace a cinema screen with it's unworthy projection. The plot holes alone are damnation enough\, to say nothing of the insidious and downright insulting attitude clearly visible in the films writing. A more clumsy attempt at \"subversive\" you would be hard pressed to find without venturing too far into literal fan-fiction.\n\nThis movie isn't just sophomoric posturing\, asinine eye-candy beyond redemption- it's an outrage. Heads should roll for this. _Roll_
